name: Fruit Harvest (Rainsong, Enjaku)
description:
Ludum Dare 52: "Harvest" -- Friday January 6th to Monday January 9th, 2023

This is a simple "catch the falling objects" game we tossed together on the Sunday night.

Click on "Play" to start. (added about two hours and a quarter before the jam ended)

Use arrow keys or A/D keys to move the basket left and right, to "catch" the autumn harvest of tasty fruit.

Score screen added about one hour and 25 minutes before end of jam.

Fixed a bug an hour before end of jam.

(Yea, I'd thought we had an hour less than we did...)

Art: Enjaku, using Aseprite
Coding: Rainsong, using ct.js
